message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm still working within my budget constraints. Could you consider selling the product to me for $95?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're really close to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more adjustment, though. I'm offering it to you for $105.
Hello Alice, thank you for your continued flexibility. I appreciate the effort. Could you consider selling the product to me for $98?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to make one more adjustment, though. I'm offering it to you for $115.
Hello Alice, thank you for your last offer. I appreciate the effort, but I'm still hoping to stay within my budget. Could you consider selling the product to me for $108?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though. I'm offering it to you for $125.
Hello Alice, thank you for your final offer. I appreciate your efforts. Could you consider selling the product to me for $110?
